api_list.name: Get latest price
Get image result today price
api_list.description: Get result image for today price
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://oil-thai-price.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oil-thai-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://oil-thai-price.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "oil-thai-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
